title: reval
content: GUYS CAN YOUR MARKS DECREASE AFTER REVAL? I AM EXPECTING 6 MARKS.. BUT STILL I AM PARANOID.. I ASKED A TEACHER AND SHE SAID THAT IT WON'T DECREASE.. BUT CAN A SENIOR PLEASE CONFIRM :((((

comments.body:
NO, YOUR GRADE WILL NOT DECREASE. HOWEVER, YOUR MARKS CAN DECREASE, BUT THEY WILL ALWAYS ASSIGN THE HIGHEST GRADE OBTAINED DURING BOTH EVALUATIONS.

YOU DO NOT HAVE TO BE PARANOID. PLEASE LET GO OF YOUR CAPS LOCK.
what if its just one mark away from slipping to the previous grade

Regardless, your grade will **never** decrease. They always assign the maximum grade obtained. So let us say you got a B grade and then after re-evaluation, they evaluated it and it came out to be a C. The final grade assigned to you will be a B. So you won't even get to know if your marks/grade decreased.
u/rowlet-owl bro my grade in reeval is stuck at TAL how long any idea?
Sorry man, I unfortunately do not happen to work with the CoE so there is no way for me to find out. Email them for more info.
